attributes.action: half the rate of fuel duty and double the  amount of duty on alchohol
attributes.additional_details: Fuel is vital for the country to do it's business and the high cost of duty on fuel is stopping us from doing this.  Alchohol, on the other hand, is not vital and costs the nation a vast amount of money every year to deal with the consequences of alchohol abuse.  A doubling of the price of duty on Alchohol would cut down on drunkeness and Alchohol abuse.  You've taxed the Smoker almost to extinction,  now it's time to hit the drinker and relieve the motorist.
